author: absolute through äлёша
definition: Dimensional analysis of consciousness archetypes and their integration patterns - mapping individual and collective psychological structures through geometric reduction

0D_entities.evidence: Each archetype represents discrete psychological organizing principle

1D_vectors.evidence: Archetypes interact through directional energy flows and polar tensions

archetypal_matrices.consciousness_layers: Concentric circles representing levels of consciousness integration from personal core to collective field
archetypal_matrices.cross_correlations: Each archetype relates to others through geometric positioning and symbolic resonance
archetypal_matrices.integration_patterns: Inner archetypes must be integrated before accessing outer archetypal energies

2D_planes.evidence: Archetypal relationships form systematic 2D interaction matrices

integrated_consciousness.personal_core: Внутренний круг - личностная идентичность и базовые мотивации
integrated_consciousness.social_interface: Средний круг - взаимодействие с окружающим миром
integrated_consciousness.cosmic_connection: Внешний круг - связь с коллективными и трансцендентными принципами

archetypal_field.function: Complete psychic architecture integrating all archetypal energies
archetypal_field.dynamics: Tensions between opposing forces create psychological movement and growth
archetypal_field.coherence: Balanced integration of all archetypes produces psychological wholeness

3D_fields.evidence: Full consciousness field integrates all archetypal layers into coherent psychological volume

archetypal_awareness.function: Conscious recognition of archetypal patterns operating in psyche
archetypal_awareness.self_observation: Ability to identify which archetypal energies are active in different situations
archetypal_awareness.integration_work: Deliberate harmonization of opposing archetypal forces

meta_psychological_understanding.perspective: Viewing personal psychology as constellation of universal principles
meta_psychological_understanding.development: Using archetypal awareness for conscious individuation and growth
meta_psychological_understanding.wisdom: Understanding how personal archetypal pattern serves collective evolution

4D_spectator.evidence: Archetypal meta-awareness enables conscious participation in psychological individuation

integration_dynamics.developmental_sequence: Inner → Middle → Outer archetypal integration over lifetime
integration_dynamics.tension_management: Balancing opposing forces rather than choosing sides
integration_dynamics.individuation_process: Conscious integration of shadow and persona archetypes
integration_dynamics.collective_service: Personal archetypal work serves collective psychological evolution

coherence_patterns.circular_coherence: Each ring of archetypes maintains internal consistency
coherence_patterns.radial_coherence: Energy flows coherently from center to periphery
coherence_patterns.polar_coherence: Opposing forces create dynamic equilibrium rather than conflict
coherence_patterns.dimensional_coherence: All levels integrate into unified psychological field

practical_applications.psychological_diagnosis: Identifying which archetypal energies are overdeveloped or suppressed
practical_applications.therapeutic_intervention: Using archetypal awareness for psychological healing and integration
practical_applications.personal_development: Conscious cultivation of underdeveloped archetypal aspects
practical_applications.relationship_dynamics: Understanding archetypal complementarity and conflict in relationships
practical_applications.creative_expression: Accessing archetypal energies for artistic and creative work
practical_applications.spiritual_development: Using archetypal map for individuation and spiritual growth

reduction_examples.raw: Person identifying strongly with Hope/Intuition archetype at center

reduction.evidence: Central archetypal identification as discrete psychological organizing principle

reduction_examples.raw: Struggle between Individual (Devil) and Collective (God) archetypal forces

reduction.evidence: Tension between opposing archetypal poles creates psychological movement

reduction_examples.raw: Conscious integration of all archetypal circles into unified personality

reduction.evidence: Meta-archetypal awareness enabling conscious individuation process

system_coherence_metrics.archetypal_balance: Degree of harmony between opposing archetypal forces
system_coherence_metrics.integration_completeness: How many archetypal aspects are consciously integrated
system_coherence_metrics.developmental_progression: Movement from inner to outer archetypal awareness
system_coherence_metrics.collective_service: How personal archetypal work benefits broader human evolution

integration_with_cfo.principle: Archetypal consciousness represents 3D psychological field with 4D integration potential
integration_with_cfo.mechanism: Archetypal awareness enables field + dimension = spectator transition in psychological development
integration_with_cfo.goal: Transform unconscious archetypal patterns into conscious individuation tools
integration_with_cfo.coherence_optimization: Understanding archetypal dynamics maximizes psychological integration and collective service
